attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for the proper definitive test
of circulating Vitamin D in the blood,

due to the mass of information that backs up the benefits of the vitamin (hormone) in the human body,and the easier method of obtaining
the supplementaion for people living in the U.K
would benefit the whole of the population,
the ease of a 25-hydroxyvitamin D,
or 25(OH)D test and funding

not!! the current 1,25-dihydroxyvitamin D test

rejection.details: Please provide your full name with your e-petition
